<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Advanced Seeker of Truths](/Feats.aspx?ID=2665) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Researcher](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=89)

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Researcher Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2658); [Seeker of Truths](/Feats.aspx?ID=2659)

</column>

---

You have unlocked deeper secrets to uncovering and hoarding lore. You gain an advanced domain spell from one domain you selected with Seeker of Truths. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

**Special** You can take this feat up to three times, each time selecting a different advanced domain spell from a domain you selected with Seeker of Truths.
name: Advanced Seeker of Truths
prerequisite: Eldritch Researcher Dedication; Seeker of Truths
